unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Getting a Diwali Makeover!**
normalised: Home Loan Schemes Getting a Diwali Makeover!

unnormalised: Diwali's just around the corner and banks are rolling out some seriously sweet home loan deals! Thinking of finally buying that dream apartment in Bandra or maybe a cozy little house near your native village? Now might be the time, bhai!
normalised: Diwali's just around the corner and banks are rolling out some seriously sweet home loan deals! Thinking of finally buying that dream apartment in Bandra or maybe a cozy little house near your native village? Now might be the time, bhai!

unnormalised: HDFC and SBI are reportedly offering rock-bottom interest rates, starting as low as 8.5% for eligible customers. Seriously, that's lower than my cousin Ravi's wedding budget. Word on the street is ICICI Bank is also joining the party with special processing fee waivers if you apply before 31/10/2024.
normalised: H D F C and S B I are reportedly offering rock-bottom interest rates, starting as low as eight point five percent for eligible customers. Seriously, that's lower than my cousin Ravi's wedding budget. Word on the street is I C I C I Bank is also joining the party with special processing fee waivers if you apply before thirty first october two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Plus, there's this new Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana scheme extension – potentially getting you a subsidy! More moolah in your pocket means more mithai for Diwali, right? Check with your local branch before 17:00 hrs on 20/10/2024 to see if you qualify! Don't delay, these deals are often valid for a limited time only! Imagine, finally hosting Diwali puja in your own house on 12/11/2024! Good luck, and happy house hunting!
normalised: Plus, there's this new Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana scheme extension – potentially getting you a subsidy! More moolah in your pocket means more mithai for Diwali, right? Check with your local branch before seventeen hundred hours on twentieth october two thousand and twenty four to see if you qualify! Don't delay, these deals are often valid for a limited time only! Imagine, finally hosting Diwali puja in your own house on twelfth november two thousand and twenty four! Good luck, and happy house hunting!
